labels.filterMessage: It's time to replace Mr. Coffee® Brewer's water filter
labels.noRuleMessage: Disable the schedule or select a day to save
labels.saveScheduleError: You need to select at least one day to save a schedule
labels.remainderDiscription: Un buen café comienza con buena agua. Los filtros de agua de carbono Mr. Coffee® eliminan el 97% del cloro y mejoran el sabor del café.
labels.btnResetTitle: Reinicie el contador de infusiones al cambiar el filtro.

reminderRules.messageCarafe: __friendlyName__ is scheduled to make coffee tomorrow, but needs you to empty and place the carafe.
reminderRules.messageRefill: __friendlyName__ is scheduled to make coffee tomorrow, but needs you to refill the water.
reminderRules.messageBoth: __friendlyName__ is scheduled to make coffee tomorrow,but its missing water and carafe.
